snippet: Some people say that top-level returns over many years show that a mutual fund manager is among the most skilled in the field. Others aren’t so sure.
lead_paragraph: Some people say that top-level returns over many years show that a mutual fund manager is among the most skilled in the field. Others aren’t so sure.

headline.main: A Master’s Skill, or Just Luck?
headline.print_headline: A Master’s Touch, Or Just Luck?
headline.seo: In Mutual Fund Returns, Skill, or Just Luck?
